md:
giải nghĩa từ "singles" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Single (noun) - Đơn, độc thân
	* Meaning: A person who is not married or in a romantic relationship.
	* Example sentence: "I'm a single mom, I have to take care of my kids on my own."
	* Related words: married, divorced, widowed, bachelor, spinster
2. Single (adjective) - Đơn, riêng biệt
	* Meaning: One only; individual; separate.
	* Example sentence: "I have a single room in the hotel, it's very small."
	* Related words: solo, alone, separate, individual, unique
3. Single (verb) - Đánh giá, chọn lọc
	* Meaning: To select or identify one person or thing from a group.
	* Example sentence: "The coach will single out the best player for the award."
	* Related words: select, choose, pick, identify, highlight
4. Single (music) - Đĩa đơn
	* Meaning: A song or piece of music released separately from an album.
	* Example sentence: "The band released a new single last week, it's a big hit."
	* Related words: album, track, song, music, release

Note: The meanings and example sentences are provided to help illustrate the different uses of the word "single". The related words are also provided to help learners expand their vocabulary and understand the nuances of the word.
